{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3497297,"name":"","username":"KnightPiscesREDACTED","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/dec6dc/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-31T00:49:24.455Z","cooked":"

Hello,
My team has been trying to code a button board using Circuitpython with the JoystickXL library, but for some reason VSCode is not recognizing the library or using the board’s python interpreter. Does anyone have any ideas for solutions?
Some more details:

  • The board is an Adafruit Grand Central.
  • We have the CircuitPython v2 extension downloaded for VSCode.
